Prof. Dr.Francisco  Das  Chagas Barbosa  Brandao 
International Student Advisor and Literature Professor

KINGSTON ONTARIO CANADA.

b)	E-mail   franbran58@hotmail.com

ESL – Ottawa University- Ottawa , On ,Canadá-
English for Academic purpose – Queen’s University - Kingston,On,CA
English for Academic purpose – saint Lawrence College – Kingston,On,CA

       International Studente Advisor -FRANBRAN- EDUCATION	

•	Professor de Prática Curricular no Programa Darcy Ribeiro da
Universidade Estadual do Maranhão – UEMA para o curso de Letras.
